snippet: Those sentenced were either family members or supporters of Long Baorong, who died in 2012 after being jailed following attempts to expose corruption.
abstract: China sentences to prison 27 people with connections to former Chinese official Long Baorong, who died in 2012 after being jailed following attempts to expose corruption; all defendants are members of Hmong tribe and had been charged with involvement in organized crime, but their advocates say allegations are politically motivated.
lead_paragraph: Those sentenced were either family members or supporters of Long Baorong, who died in 2012 after being jailed following attempts to expose corruption.

headline.main: China Sentences 27 Linked to Official Who Reported Graft
headline.print_headline: China Sentences 27 Linked to Official Who Reported Graft
